title: Monster Truck Championship + 2 DLCs
body:
Monster Truck Championship + 2 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Racing, Simulation, 3D, Monster trucks
Companies: Teyon, Nacon
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI14
Original Size: 8.3 GB
Repack Size: 4.3 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: PixelDrain

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Monster.Truck.Championship-CODEX ISO release: codex-monster.truck.championship.iso (8,964,177,920 bytes)
  • 2 DLCs (Patriot Pack & Rebel Hunter Pack) are included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 8.3 to 4.3 GB)
  • Installation takes 3-6 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 26 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

A true Monster Truck simulation!

From Las Vegas to Orlando, go head-to-head against experienced drivers in drag races and freestyle competitions! But before you can pull off doughnuts, wheelies and bicycles, you must first tune your truck to perfection. These machines are spectacular and impressive yet highly technical to drive. The game faithfully reproduces all the unique demands of mastering these powerful trucks, including independent front and rear wheel management, mass transfer anticipation in bends, and predicting bounces after jumps.

But what’s performance without style? Customise your Monster Truck to reflect your style and show it off to your 7 opponents in online mode.

Game Features

  • 16 different Monster Trucks
  • Over 50 customisable elements
  • 25 arenas
  • 3 different leagues
